# Epoch #4 Energy Framework

A scholarly white paper exploring energy from cosmic to biological scales

Author: S. Thaddeus Connelly, DDS, MD, PhD, FACS

## Sections
- [Introduction](https://epoch4-energy.com/#introduction): Overview of energy as the unifying concept across cosmology, physics, biology, and information.
- [Cosmic Scale](https://epoch4-energy.com/#cosmic): Explains the universe's energy budget and the role of dark energy and dark matter.
- [Classical Mechanics](https://epoch4-energy.com/#classical): Defines kinetic and potential energy, work, and the First Law of Thermodynamics.
- [Relativity](https://epoch4-energy.com/#relativity): Explores mass-energy equivalence and relativistic energy relations.
- [Bioenergetics](https://epoch4-energy.com/#bioenergetics): Describes ATP production, mitochondrial gradients, and metabolic work.
- [Entropy](https://epoch4-energy.com/#entropy): Explains the Second Law, entropy growth, and energy quality.
- [Complexity](https://epoch4-energy.com/#complexity): Introduces dissipative structures and self-organization in living systems.
- [Least Action](https://epoch4-energy.com/#least-action): Shows how action principles generate physical laws and biological optimization.
- [Noether's Theorem](https://epoch4-energy.com/#noether): Connects symmetry to conservation laws and energetic stability.
- [Information Thermodynamics](https://epoch4-energy.com/#info): Details Landauer's principle and the physics of information.
- [Conclusion](https://epoch4-energy.com/#conclusion): Synthesizes energy, entropy, symmetry, and information for Epoch #4.
